trans-unit.source: Provides constants for compatibility with the <see langword="ScaleMode" /> constants in Visual Basic 6.0.
trans-unit.target: Fornece constantes para compatibilidade com as constantes <see langword="ScaleMode" /> do Visual Basic 6.0.

trans-unit.source: In Visual Basic 6.0, `ScaleMode` constants were used to represent various units of measurement for the `ScaleMode` property.
trans-unit.target: No Visual Basic 6.0, `ScaleMode` constantes foram usadas para representar várias unidades de medida para o `ScaleMode` propriedade.

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)], the `ScaleMode` property is no longer supported, and these constants are no longer necessary.
trans-unit.target: Em [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)], o `ScaleMode` não há suporte para a propriedade e constantes não são mais necessários.

trans-unit.source: These constants enable code that has been upgraded from Visual Basic 6.0 to continue to run without additional modification.
trans-unit.target: Constantes permitem que o código que foi atualizado do Visual Basic 6.0 para continuar a ser executados sem modificações adicionais.

trans-unit.source: Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Funções e os objetos no namespace <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> são fornecidos para uso pelas ferramentas para atualização do Visual Basic 6.0 para o [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Na maioria dos casos, essas funções e objetos duplicam a funcionalidade que é possível encontrar em outros namespaces no [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the .NET Framework implementation.
trans-unit.target: Eles apenas são necessários quando o modelo de código do Visual Basic 6.0 difere significativamente da implementação do .NET Framework.

trans-unit.source: Equivalent to the Visual Basic 6.0 constant <see langword="vbCentimeters" />.
trans-unit.target: Equivalente à constante <see langword="vbCentimeters" /> do Visual Basic 6.0.

trans-unit.source: Equivalent to the Visual Basic 6.0 constant <see langword="vbCharacters" />.
trans-unit.target: Equivalente à constante <see langword="vbCharacters" /> do Visual Basic 6.0.

trans-unit.source: Equivalent to the Visual Basic 6.0 constant <see langword="vbHimetric" />.
trans-unit.target: Equivalente à constante <see langword="vbHimetric" /> do Visual Basic 6.0.

trans-unit.source: Equivalent to the Visual Basic 6.0 constant <see langword="vbInches" />.
trans-unit.target: Equivalente à constante <see langword="vbInches" /> do Visual Basic 6.0.

trans-unit.source: Equivalent to the Visual Basic 6.0 constant <see langword="vbMillimeters" />.
trans-unit.target: Equivalente à constante <see langword="vbMillimeters" /> do Visual Basic 6.0.

trans-unit.source: Equivalent to the Visual Basic 6.0 constant <see langword="vbPoints" />.
trans-unit.target: Equivalente à constante <see langword="vbPoints" /> do Visual Basic 6.0.
